name: Button
description: A versatile button component with primary, secondary, and outline variants. Supports disabled state, loading state with spinner, and different sizes (sm, md, lg). Should handle click events and be fully accessible.

name: Card
description: A container component for grouping related content. Has optional header, body, and footer sections. Supports elevated and outlined variants with customizable padding.

name: Input
description: A text input field with label, placeholder support, error state with message, helper text, and optional left/right icons. Should handle value changes and be accessible.

name: Avatar
description: A circular avatar component that displays a user image with fallback to initials when no image is provided. Supports different sizes (xs, sm, md, lg, xl) and an optional status indicator.

name: Badge
description: A small status indicator or label component. Supports multiple color variants (default, primary, success, warning, error) and sizes. Can be rendered as a dot-only indicator.

name: Alert
description: A message component for displaying feedback to users. Supports severity levels (info, success, warning, error) with appropriate icons. Has optional title, description, and dismiss button.

name: Modal
description: A dialog overlay component that displays content on top of the page. Has a backdrop, close button, header, body, and footer sections. Should trap focus and close on escape key.

name: Dropdown
description: A select component with a trigger button and dropdown menu. Supports single selection, keyboard navigation (arrow keys, enter, escape), and custom option rendering.

name: Tabs
description: A tabbed navigation component with tab buttons and content panels. Supports controlled and uncontrolled modes, disabled tabs, and keyboard navigation between tabs.

name: Accordion
description: An expandable content component with multiple collapsible sections. Each section has a header that toggles visibility. Supports single-expand and multi-expand modes with smooth animation.
